p: Would you like to work for an industry leader that is deeply invested in your personal career growth? People stay a long time because they love their management and colleagues. This professional development-oriented environment will not only improve your tech chops, grow your business skills but it also seems to foster professional friendships that last a lifetime.
p.2: Here, you'd be joining a top firm that=E2=80=99s a leader in data integration and data integrity consulting. But you'll get to work on their in-house investment tools and products (not those of outside clients), refining their own technology that improves the decision-making process for the banking, investment, healthcare and fintech arenas.
p.4: Tech-wise, the stack you=E2=80=99ll work focuses on Python, R, Linux and SQL.

strong: Your Next High-Growth Software Development Role
